Skokie.Seabury-Western Theological Seminary: Seabury-Western Theological Seminary (SWTS) was a seminary of The Episcopal Church, located in Evanston, Illinois. It ceased operations as a residential seminary granting the Master of Divinity degree in May 2010, and in January 2012 it moved from Evanston to the Evangelical Lutheran Church in America headquarters near O'Hare Airport. In 2013, it federated with Bexley Hall seminary to form the Bexley Hall Seabury Western Theological Seminary Federation, the federation then moved to the second floor of Chichago Theological Seminary in July of 2016 to continue to offer its academic degrees including its Master of Divinity degree.
